entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.2°C
entry.summary:

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow mixed with ice pellets. High zero. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of light snow or ice pellets and risk of freezing drizzle. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill near minus 7. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of rain or snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of light snow or rain or ice pellets early this evening. Periods of light snow or rain mixed with ice pellets beginning this evening changing to rain mixed with ice pellets near midnight. Wind south 20 km/h becoming light before morning. Temperature steady near plus 1. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Wednesday 28 December 2022

entry.title: Thursday: A few showers. Temperature steady near plus 3.
